title: Hot New Science Fiction EBooks
description:
Second try at uploading these new science fiction ebooks I have just read and recommend.

Supervolcano -All Fall Down - Harry Turtledove

Supervolcano -Eruption - Harry Turtledove

Supervolcano -Things Fall Apart - Harry Turtledove

On Such a Full Sea -Chang Rae Lee
 
Countdown City the last policeman book - Ben H Winters

Red Rising - Pierce Brown

Hollow City - Ransom Riggs

Sand - Hugh Howey

Sparks of Chaos - Kevin Caruso

The Ascendant - Drew Chapman

The Hit - Melvin Burgess

Hitchers - Will McIntosh
